CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 22, 1969, pg. 31 reads: "Conference Cabinet Guests - at the closing session of the Allegheny AME Zion 123rd annual meeting, held at Wesley Center Church, join with the Presiding Bishop W.A. Hilliard, fourth from left, extending a formal greeting to Calvin C. Calahan, right foreground, who had come all the way from Oakland, Calif., to visit the conference. Others in picture reading from left are, Dr. David H. Bradley, chairman of budget committee; Mrs. Emma B. Watson, general president; Bishop C.H. Foggie, associate; Dr. A.L. Pierce, Presiding Elder; Rev. V.R. Hill, conference host; Mrs. W.A. Hilliard, supervisor; Dr. E.W. Gantt, guest Presiding Elder; Mrs. Willa Mae Rice, secretary, budget committee; Rev. K .Melvin Smith, Sacramento, Calif., and Rev. George Kendall, Wesley Center pastor. - Harris Photo."image of Willa Mae Rice not in negative, pasted in image published by Pittsburgh Courier
TitMainTitle: Bishop W. A. Hilliard, shaking hands with Calvin C. Calahan, while from left, Dr. David H. Bradley, Emma B. Watson, Bishop Charles H. Foggie, Dr. A. L. Pierce, Rev. V. R. Hill, Mrs. W. A. Hilliard, Dr. E. W. Gantt, Rev. K. Melvin Smith, and Rev. George Kendall looking on behind altar rail, in Wesley Center AME Zion Church
